title: Ahmedabad
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Ahmedabad GJ, from a wide variety of genres like Bollywood, Entertainment, India, Indian and Talk.  Enjoy stations such as Swaminarayan Kirtan Bhakti, Radio City 91.1 FM, Gyan Vani - Gyan Vani Ahmedabad, Astrology Radio, My FM 94.3 - Ahmedabad and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.

radios.title: All India Radio West Service - AIR Ahmedabad

radio_info.short: AIR Ahmedabad is a broadcast radio station in Ahmedabad, India, providing News, Education and Entertainment on 846 AM and 96.7 FM. As part of Akashvani
radio_info.rest: (All India Radio public broadcasting service), AIR Ahmedabad produces and airs local newscasts, talk shows for lifestyle and educational purposes, and local entertainment by performance artists in Ahmedabad and surrounding areas. As well, AIR Ahmedabad airs productions by All India Radio that include farm and business information, family education and advice, and variety and musical shows.

title: Bhuj
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Bhuj GJ, from a wide variety of genres like India, Praise & Worship, Religious, Spiritual and Talk.  Enjoy stations such as Swaminarayan Radio - Swaminarayan Katha, Swaminarayan Radio - Swaminarayan Dhun, All India Radio West Service - AIR Bhuj, Swaminarayan Radio - Swaminarayan Kirtan, Radio Minhaj India and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.

radio_info.short: Swaminarayan Radio - Swaminarayan Katha is a channel on the internet radio station Swaminarayan Radio from Bhuj, GJ, India providing Hindu Religious music, talk, live
radio_info.rest: shows and spiritual programs. Swaminarayan Katha Radio bought to you by Shree Swaminarayan Temple Bhuj (Bhuj Mandir); listen to hours of Katha (spiritual discourses) recited by revered Saints from the Swaminarayan Sampraday. This Station also does Live Broadcast from Bhuj Mandir Sabha Mandap whenever there is activity there.

title: Vadodara
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Vadodara GJ, from a wide variety of genres like India, Indian, Oldies, Religious and Spiritual.  Enjoy stations such as Sayaji FM, Swastik Gayatri Mantra, Swastik Telugu Bhajan, Swastik Marathi Bhajan, Swastik Gujarati Bhajan and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.

radio_info.short: Sayaji FM is own Online Radio Station for The Maharaja Sayajirao University of Baroda, Vadodara, Gujarat, started by RJ Yogesh. Alike our radio station most
radio_info.rest: of our RJs are new here. But all are so dedicated to Sayaji FM that they try to give out their best and work out the best for us. We all know that, usually RJs come at studio for 2-3 hours for their show and then they go out. But at the Sayaji FM being a RJ is not so easy job, coz they are not only Radio Jockey. They are all in all of their show, they do everything for their show, starting from script writing, to selecting tracks, making a playlist, to promoting their show and keeping a touch with their own listeners. They are so hard working individuals that just a word of appreciation is not enough for them. They think good for Sayaji FM & whatever is good for our station as well as whatever entertains our listeners. Our all RJs are friendly and responsive to their listener. They work at friendly environment and also try to create friendly environment on AIR. The one outstanding thing about our Radio Jockey is that they are idea maker too, they give new ideas of shows and they make special show for special day like mother's day, father's day, friendship day, valentine's day, etc.

radio_contacts.short: Sayaji FM is own Online Radio Station for The Maharaja Sayajirao University of Baroda, Vadodara, Gujarat, started by RJ Yogesh. Alike our radio station most
